summary: OpenAPI schema generation fails with UnboundLocalError when status_code_param.default is not an integer, causing /docs endpoint to return 500.
symptoms: UnboundLocalError: local variable 'status_code' referenced before assignment
suspected_root_cause: Code path in openapi/utils.py line 261-265 does not set status_code variable when status_code_param.default is not an int, leading to UnboundLocalError
